trends: There have been no other sightings in Aba
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsIn a town called nbawsi, in Imo Abia State Nigeria i lived there when i was in my teens , i saw clearly one night red fire burning in the sky , i stood for a while and observed it for about 5,the shape was 1, fire ,huge and red , it did,nt vanish but i left it wondering in my mind what i was .. till now.
